children.text: There is loose waffle pod debris in areas throughout the base, which will reduce the effective beam sizes and minimum concrete cover around the steel reinforcement.
It is a requirement of section 5.3.2 Reinforcement of AS 2870 Residential Slabs and Footings, that
‘Reinforcement in rafts and slabs shall be placed with minimum concrete cover of 20mm to an internal surface’ .
The waffle pod debris in these areas must be completely cleaned out prior to pouring concrete.
